glosses: To remember positively, to honor or commemorate someone's memory.

examples.text: Bugün kıymetli büyüklerimizin aziz hatırasını yâd ediyoruz.
examples.translation: Today we are honoring the dear memory of our venerable elders.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish یاد ایتمك (yād itmek, etmek, “to remember, to recollect, to mention by name”), from یاد (yād), equivalent to compound of yâd (“an act of remembering, remembrance”) + etmek (“to do, to make”).
